<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Surging Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=4672) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 117 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
An ally you can see falls to 0 Hit Points

</column>

---

When an ally you can see falls in battle, your surge of righteous indignation allows you to draw upon untapped reserves of divine power. You instantly regain 1 Focus Point.
name: Surging Focus
